greeting: Ah, the renowned {empire_name}! Your wisdom precedes you, my friend. I am Diplomat Silk, utterly charmed.

Oh, {empire_name}! I've heard such wonderful things! I'm Silk, and it's truly an honor to make your acquaintance!

Defeated! But by such a charming opponent! Your wisdom precedes you, {empire_name}—truly masterful!
